mav_sim.chap4.run_sim module¶

Run the chapter 4 simulation run_sim.py

  • Chapter 4 assignment for Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Update history:

    12/18/2018 - RWB 1/14/2019 - RWB 12/21 - GND

mav_sim.chap4.run_sim.run_sim(sim: MsgSimParams, delta_fnc: Callable[[float], MsgDelta], init_state: DynamicState | None = None, mav_view: MavViewer | None = None, data_view: DataViewer | None = None, use_wind: bool = False, gust_params: MsgGustParams | None = None) → tuple[MavViewer, DataViewer]¶

Runs the chapter 4 simulation

Parameters:

  • sim – Timing and file parameters for the simulation

  • delta – Fixed control surfaces

  • init_state – Initial state of the MAV

  • mav_view – Viewing window to be used for the mav

  • data_view – Viewing window to be used for the states

  • use_wind – True => wind will be used, False => no wind

Returns:

Viewing window to be used for the mav data_view: Viewing window to be used for the states

Return type:

mav_view

mav_sim
